results.title: Takayasu Arteritis Mistaken for Epilepsy: A Case Presenting With Convulsive Syncope
results.text_hl: He was prescribed @CHEMICAL_Dexamethasone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003907 @@@dexamethasone@@@, @CHEMICAL_Methotrexate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008727 @@@methotrexate@@@, @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@acetylsalicylic acid@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@. He had a remarkable recovery and was @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@-free for the last 5 months after discharge.

citations.NLM: Pallangyo P, Misidai N, Hemed NR, Swai HJ, Mkojera Z, Bhalia S, Lyimo F, Millinga J, Wibonela SA, Janabi M. Takayasu Arteritis Mistaken for Epilepsy: A Case Presenting With Convulsive Syncope J Med Cases. 2020 Feb;11(2):37-40. PMID: 34434357

results.title: An experimental study of the anticonvulsant effect of amlodipine in mice.
results.text_hl: In the @CHEMICAL_Pentylenetetrazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010433 @@@pentylenetetrazole@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@ model, 50 percent of the @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were protected from mortality with 1 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and 60 percent, with 4 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Sathyanarayana Rao KN, Subbalakshmi NK. An experimental study of the anticonvulsant effect of amlodipine in mice. Singapore Med J. 2010 May;51(5):424-8. PMID: 20593148

results.title: The effects of dihydropyridine calcium channel modulators on pentylenetetrazole convulsions.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@Nifedipine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (10 mg/kg) and @CHEMICAL_3_Pyridinecarboxylic_acid_1_4_dihydro_2_6_dimethyl_5_nitro_4_(2_(trifluoromethyl)phenyl)__Methyl_ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001498 @@@BAY K 8644@@@ (2 mg/kg) also produced an increase in the onset time for @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@convulsions@@@.

results.title: Prolonged anticoagulant activity of rivaroxaban in a polymorbid elderly female with non-convulsive epileptic state.
results.text_hl: CASE REPORT: A 88-years-old female (body-mass-index = 19.95) with @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, hospitalized because of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ and a non-@<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@convulsive epileptic@@@ state, was treated by @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@valproate@@@, mirtazepin, @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Digitoxin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004074 @@@digitoxin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Gliclazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005907 @@@gliclazide@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Stöllberger C, Finsterer J. Prolonged anticoagulant activity of rivaroxaban in a polymorbid elderly female with non-convulsive epileptic state. Heart Lung. 2014 May-Jun;43(3):262-3. PMID: 24794785
